name: Tortellini in Chicken Broth
author: apotherix
summary: In Italy, this soup is called tortellini en brodo. If you keep your freezer stocked, this soup is a snap to whip up after a long day at the office.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) package frozen cheese tortellini
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Stir broth and water together in a pot; bring to a boil
Stir frozen tortellini into broth mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, until tortellini float to the top and the filling is hot, 6 to 8 minutes
Stir watercress and scallions into broth mixture and cook until watercress wilts, about 2 minutes
Sprinkle with Romano cheese and black pepper to serve
